titles.title: Home Modifications for the Climate Crisis Act
Home Modifications for the Climate Crisis Act
A bill to amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to ensure services for home modifications under part B of title III of such Act may be used for certain purposes, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
